dsense.name: track
dsense.guideword: (racing circuit) (体育运动，田径场、赛马场、赛车场)

example.eg: Are you going to the track on Saturday to see the race?
example.egtrans: 你准备星期六去赛道看赛事吗？

example.eg: The train tracks pass close to their house.
example.egtrans: 铁轨在他们家附近穿过。

example.eg: They came by this way - look, you can see their tracks.
example.egtrans: 他们是从这边来的，看这里的足迹就知道。

example.eg: There were tyre tracks in the mud.
example.egtrans: 泥地上有轮胎的痕迹。

dsense.name: track
dsense.guideword: (piece of recorded music, song) (唱片、磁带上的)

example.eg: The hit song was the third track on the CD.
example.egtrans: 那首热门单曲是CD上的第三首歌。

example.eg: The natives can track an animal for miles.
example.egtrans: 当地土著人可以跟踪动物好几英里。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 跟踪, 追踪, 追猎

example.eg: The detective had been tracking the criminal for months.
example.egtrans: 侦探连续数月都在追踪罪犯。

example.eg: When you order from this website, you can track the shipment online.
example.egtrans: 在这家网站购物，可以在线跟踪快递。

example.eg: The teacher tracked the student's progress.
example.egtrans: 老师对该学生的进步进行了追踪调查。

example.eg: The track of the bike race passed through the town.
example.egtrans: 自行车比赛的赛道穿过了城镇。

example.eg: There is a track through the woods to the lake.
example.egtrans: 树林里有一条通往湖泊的小径。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 道路, 小径, 小路

dsense.name: track
dsense.guideword: (recording track on a cassette) (磁带、唱片)

example.eg: Years ago, people used to listen to eight track tapes.
example.egtrans: 好些年前，人们曾经会听八轨磁带。

dsense.name: track
dsense.guideword: (one instrument on a song) (音乐中不同乐器的)

example.eg: The producer mixed in the drum track with the guitar track.
example.egtrans: 音乐制作人将鼓声声道和吉他声道混在了一起。

example.eg: If you are not sure of the dance steps, just follow my track.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 足迹, 步伐, 步子

dsense.name: track
dsense.guideword: US (educational stream) (按能力或成绩分成的班组)

example.eg: He is on the accelerated learning track at his school.
example.egtrans: 他在学校的快班学习。

example.eg: The tank track came off in the explosion.
example.egtrans: 爆炸中，坦克的轨道脱落了。

example.eg: What's the track between the wheels on this car?
example.egtrans: 这辆车车轮间的间距是多少？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 车辙, 车轮之间的间距

example.eg: I think he is on the wrong track by trying to get a job in advertising.
example.egtrans: 我认为他试图在广告业找到一份工作是错误的行为步骤。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一连串的行动，行为步骤，行动路线

example.eg: I know it's difficult to understand, but do you follow my track?
example.egtrans: 我知道这很难理解，不过你跟上我的思路了吗？

example.eg: The rollercoaster's track twists and turns.
example.egtrans: 过山车的轨道迂回曲折。

example.eg: He went out for track in college.
example.egtrans: 大学期间，他参加了田径运动。

example.eg: You can tell by the tracks on the man's arms that he is a drug addict.
example.egtrans: 你从那个人手臂上的针眼就能看出他是个瘾君子。

example.eg: We tracked through the mountains of West Virginia.
The director shouted at everyone, while the cameraman kept tracking.
example.egtrans: 摄影师还在跟踪拍摄的时候，导演就朝所有人大吼大叫。

example.eg: This back wheel isn't tracking with the other three.
example.egtrans: 这只后轮的轨迹与其他三个轮子的不吻合。

example.eg: He was tracked into the accelerated learning programme.
Now you have tracked mud on the new carpet!
Look!  You have tracked the whole house which I have just cleaned!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…留下脏足迹, 走脏, 踩脏

example.eg: The detectives were not able to track the caller.
example.egtrans: 侦探没能追踪到来电者。

example.eg: The posse used bloodhounds to track down the fugitive.
example.egtrans: 武装队用警犬追捕逃犯。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 追踪到, 追查到, 追捕

example.eg: I'll see if I can track down that recipe for you.
example.egtrans: 我看能不能帮你找到那份菜谱。

dsense.name: beaten track, beaten path, beaten route

example.eg: If we wander off the beaten track, we'll probably get lost.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 熟路, 常有人走的路

example.eg: You should have left him outside - now there are dog tracks all over my nice clean floor!
This course is a fast track to A-level exams that takes one year rather than the usual two.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 加快的，加速的, 快速的

example.eg: His father put pressure on them to fast-track his application.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 回到正轨, 重回正轨

dsense.name: get on track
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (pursue correct path) (比喻，非正式用语)

example.eg: My coach has a program to help me get on track for the Olympics.
A half-track is a cross between a tank and a road vehicle.
The index mark indicates the starting point of a track on a hard drive.
Write down what you've achieved each day, as it's important to keep track.
example.egtrans: 因为记录进展很重要，所以把你每天做了些什么都写下来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 记录…的进展, 了解…的动态

example.eg: My daughter emails me every day so I can keep track of her movements.  You should keep track of your expenses so that you know how much money you have left.
example.egtrans: 你应该记录自己的每笔开销，这样一来你就能对自己还剩多少钱做到心里有数。

example.eg: Where have we got to with this project? I've lost track.
I was late because I lost track of time.

dsense.name: off the beaten track, off the beaten path

example.eg: We prefer to eat with the locals in small restaurants off the beaten track.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在偏僻处, 在人迹罕至处

example.eg: Our discussion seems to have gone off track; let's get back to the main subject.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 走对路了，循着正确的路线，走正确的路

example.eg: After failing her class last semester, she got back on the right track and passed this semester.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （想法、做法等）循着正确的道路

dsense.name: on track
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (following correct path or schedule)

example.eg: I use an app to keep all my projects on track.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有序安排, 合理安排

example.eg: The meeting established that the team was on track to finish the project by June.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 朝着...行进, 朝着...发展, 以...为目标

dsense.name: one-track mind
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (mental focus on one thing only)

example.eg: We're going to the racetrack to practice driving.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 赛马场跑道, 用于赛马的跑道

example.eg: The length of the running track is 400m.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 单轨的, 单线的，单轨的

example.eg: That man has a single-track mind; all he ever thinks about is work.
The soundtrack featured a lot of 1960s music.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 电影配乐, 音乐磁带, 音乐唱片

example.eg: The soundtrack was terrible but luckily there were subtitles.
Talia is good at most sports, but she really excels at track and field.
Discus is a track and field event.

dsense.name: track and field athletes, track-and-field athletes

example.eg: Track-and-field athletes include runners, sprinters, and pole vaulters.
My daughter won first place at the high school track meet in the 50 yard dash.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 田径运动会, 田径比赛, 径赛

dsense.name: track pants (US), tracksuit trousers, tracksuit bottoms (UK)
track record
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (previous performance) (比喻，非正式用语)

example.eg: This employee has a great track record of finishing work on time.
example.egtrans: 这名员工有良好的按时完工的业务记录。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以前的成绩记录，业绩，业务记录，工作成绩记录

dsense.name: tracking shot, track shot, dolly shot, trucking shot
tracksuit, track suit
dsense.guideword: (athlete's trouser suit) (运动员训练时所穿)

example.eg: The members of the gymnastics team wore matching tracksuits and hair ribbons.
example.egtrans: 体操队成员都穿着配套的运动服，戴着配套的发带。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 运动套装，运动服，运动衣裤
